page.title: 07Emmerdale Farm
page.content: This is a contemporary domestic TV serial about the everyday life of families living in a farming area. It is very realistic because it is not exaggerated and shows the lives of ordinary working class people.It is a popular serial which has been shown for half an hour,twice a week,for several years.The outdoor scenes are filmed in Esholt.The real village is made up of a few dozen houses,a shop, a pub,a church,and a memorial hall.The pub,called{The Woolpack}in the serial is actually called the{Commercial Inn} The memorial hall is used for the children's playgroup.The church and houses are also used.Some of the residents enjoy all the publicity that the programme brings.Esholt is a regular call for tourist buses.But for others the tourists are a nuisance, with the mess and litter they create.
